
```{r}
ecoeg <- proc.ras.eg(x = "EG19_fc/Ecoregion_EG.img") 

ecoeg
```

```{r}
ec <- proc.ras.eg(x = "EG19_fc/Ecoregion_EG.img")
ic19 <- proc.ras.eg(x = "EG19_fc/IC_EG_2019.img")
ic20 <- proc.ras.eg(x = "EG19_fc/IC_EG_2020.img")
ma <- proc.ras.eg(x = "EG19_fc/Zones_EG.img")
st <- proc.ras.eg(x = "EG19_fc/Stands_EG.img")
fe <- proc.ras.eg(x = "EG19_fc/FireEco.img")
sl <- proc.ras.eg(x = "EG19_fc/Slope_EG.img")
as <- proc.ras.eg(x = "EG19_fc/Aspect_EG.img")
```


## Rescale to 400m2
```{r}
l4_ec_a <- raster::aggregate(ec, fact = 2, fun = most.freq)
l4_ic19_a <- raster::aggregate(ic19, fact = 2, fun = most.freq)
l4_ic20_a <- raster::aggregate(ic20, fact = 2, fun = most.freq)
l4_ma_a <- raster::aggregate(ma, fact = 2, fun = most.freq)
l4_st_a <- raster::aggregate(st, fact = 2, fun = most.freq)
l4_fe_a <- raster::aggregate(fe, fact = 2, fun = most.freq)
l4_sl_a <- raster::aggregate(sl, fact = 2, fun = mean)
l4_as_a <- raster::aggregate(as, fact = 2, aspect.avg)
```

```{r}
l4_ec_a
```

```{r}
plot(l4_ic19_a)
```


```{r}
writeRaster(x = l4_ec_a, filename = paste0(dirpath, "/", "EG2019_400/Ecoregion_EG.img"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(x = l4_ic19_a, filename = paste0(dirpath, "/", "EG2019_400/IC_EG_2019.img"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(x = l4_ic20_a, filename = paste0(dirpath, "/", "EG2019_400/IC_EG_2020.img"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(x = l4_ma_a, filename = paste0(dirpath, "/", "EG2019_400/Zones_EG.img"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(x = l4_st_a, filename = paste0(dirpath, "/", "EG2019_400/Stands_EG.img"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(x = l4_if_a, filename = paste0(dirpath, "/", "EG2019_400/FireEco.img"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(x = l4_sl_a, filename = paste0(dirpath, "/", "EG2019_400/Slope_EG.img"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(x = l4_as_a, filename = paste0(dirpath, "/", "EG2019_400/Aspect_EG.img"), overwrite = TRUE)
```


## rescale to 1 km2 
```{r}
l1k_ec_a <- raster::aggregate(ec, fact = 10, fun = most.freq)
l1k_ic19_a <- raster::aggregate(ic19, fact = 10, fun = most.freq)
l1k_ic20_a <- raster::aggregate(ic20, fact = 10, fun = most.freq)

l1k_as_a <- raster::aggregate(as, fact = 10, aspect.avg)
```

```{r}
l1k_ec_a
```


